skilllist.skilldesc: Angela gains 7.5% extra Movement Speed for 4s each time she casts a skill (up to 30%). When she's attached to an allied hero, the Movement Speed boost is transferred to the allied hero.

Angela sends <font color="a6aafb">Love Waves</font> in the target direction, dealing 170<font color="62f8fe"> (+80% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> to enemies hit, revealing their positions briefly, and applying a stack of <font color="a6aafb">Lover's Mark</font> (up to 5 stacks). Each stack of <font color="a6aafb">Lover's Mark</font> increases the damage by 20% and slows enemies hit by 8% for 3s.

<font color="a6aafb">Love Waves</font> also restore 150<font color="62f8fe"> (+75% Total Magic Power)</font> HP to allied heroes hit. Angela can store up to 5 charges of this skill and the recharge time is affected by Cooldown Reduction.

Angela launches a <font color="a6aafb">Puppet String</font> at the target enemy, dealing 300<font color="62f8fe"> (+40% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font> and gradually slowing them by up to 80%. If the enemy is still connected to the string after 3s, they'll be immobilized for 1.5s and dealt 450<font color="62f8fe"> (+60% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="7f62fe">Magic Damage</font>.

Each stack of <font color="a6aafb">Lover's Mark</font> increases the final damage by 20%.

Angela begins channeling, applying a 1000<font color="62f8fe"> (+200% Total Magic Power)</font> shield that lasts 6s to the target allied hero regardless of distance. After the channeling is complete, she attaches herself to the allied hero for 12s, during which she can cast skills at zero Mana cost.
Angela can cast this skill again to cancel the channeling or detach herself from the allied hero. The attaching state will end early if the allied hero is killed.

__data.skilldesc: Gain 50% extra Movement Speed and <font color="62f8fe">Slow Immunity</font> for 6s.
__data.skilldesc_text: Gain <%Num2> extra Movement Speed and [C2Slow Immunity] for <Num1>s.
__data.skilldescemblem: Gain 50% extra Movement Speed and <font color="62f8fe">Slow Immunity</font> for 6s.

recommendmasterplan.description: Roaming: CD Reduction to spam skills and support allies.

emblemattr.emblemattr:
+12% Healing Effect
+10% Cooldown Reduction
+6% Movement Speed

emblemskill.skilldesc: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by 15%.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by <%Num1>.
emblemskill.skilldescemblem: Cooldowns of Battle Spells and equipment's active skills are reduced by 15%.

emblemskill.skilldesc:
Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by 6% for 3s.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 4s</font>.
emblemskill.skilldesc_text: Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by <%Num1> for <Num2>s.########[8098ab]Cooldown: <Num3>s[-].
emblemskill.skilldescemblem:
Dealing damage to an enemy hero increases allied heroes' damage to them by 6% for 3s.

<font color="8098ab">Cooldown: 4s</font>.

equiplist.equipskill3: <font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
equiplist.equipskill4: <font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
equiplist.equipskill5: <font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
equiplist.equipskill6: Mysticism: Getting a kill or assist on an enemy Minion will restore 4% Mana. (An assist occurs when a Minion dies within 2s after taking damage from the hero.)
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Passive - Favor: 
<font color="FFD700">Devotion</font>: In the first 8 min, forfeit the EXP and Gold rewards gained from minions and creeps in order to negate reductions for nearby allies.
<font color="FFD700">Thriving</font>: Gain an extra 45% EXP and Gold from assists during the first 8 min. <font color="7f62fe">Unique in Team</font>: Give 8 Gold or 20 EXP to the ally with the lowest Gold or EXP every 5s. Grant 25% more if you have the lowest Gold or EXP.
<font color="FFD700">Blessing</font>: Once the total amount of Gold gained from Thriving reaches 600, a skill is awarded. Gold can continue to be gained from Thriving to enhance this skill.
Mysticism: Getting a kill or assist on an enemy Minion will restore 4% Mana. (An assist occurs when a Minion dies within 2s after taking damage from the hero.)

equiplist.equipskill1: Timestream: Hero kills or assists reduce the Ultimate's current cooldown by 30%.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Timestream: Hero kills or assists reduce the Ultimate's current cooldown by 30%.
equiplist.equiptips:
+30 Adaptive Attack
+600 Extra Max HP
+15% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1:
Blessing: When casting a healing or shield skill, if the target's HP is below 35% or falls below 35% within 3s, they will get a (+100*Hero Level) shield that lasts 3s. When this effect triggers, it also reduces the cooldown of the caster's skills by 2s.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect can only trigger once every 60s on the same target, and will not trigger on self-only healing and shield skills.</font>
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Blessing: When casting a healing or shield skill, if the target's HP is below 35% or falls below 35% within 3s, they will get a (+100*Hero Level) shield that lasts 3s. When this effect triggers, it also reduces the cooldown of the caster's skills by 2s.
<font color="A4AAC7">This effect can only trigger once every 60s on the same target, and will not trigger on self-only healing and shield skills.</font>
equiplist.equiptips:
+12% Healing Effect
+60 Magic Power
+300 Extra Max HP
+10% Cooldown Reduction

equiplist.equipskill1: Ice Bound: When a skill deals damage to an enemy hero, it will also slow them by 10% for 2s (stacks up to 3 times). This effect has a 1s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Ice Bound: When a skill deals damage to an enemy hero, it will also slow them by 10% for 2s (stacks up to 3 times). This effect has a 1s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+75 Magic Power
+10% Spell Vamp
+300 Extra Max HP
+7% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Scorch: Dealing Magic Damage burns the targets for 3s, also dealing extra Magic Damage equal to 1% of the target's Max HP per second.
equiplist.equipskill2: Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
equiplist.equipskilldesc:
Scorch: Dealing Magic Damage burns the targets for 3s, also dealing extra Magic Damage equal to 1% of the target's Max HP per second.
Lifebane: Dealing damage to a target will reduce the Shield and HP Regen effects on them to 50% of normal for 3s.
equiplist.equiptips:
+75 Magic Power
+400 Extra Max HP
+5% Movement Speed

equiplist.equipskill1: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equipskilldesc: Immortal: Resurrect 2.5s upon death and get 16% HP and a shield that can absorb 150(+70*Hero Level) damage. Shield lasts 3s. This effect has a 210s cooldown.
equiplist.equiptips:
+800 Extra Max HP
+15 Extra Physical Defense

recommendmasterplan.name: KUYAKEN
recommendmasterplan.title: Pro Player

assist.desc: Angela works best with highly mobile Assassins such as Lancelot and Aamon since she can provide CC and heals while increasing their mobility even further.

strong.desc: Angela counters heroes with low mobility, such as Uranus and Belerick, by slowing them even further and speeding up her allies.

weak.desc: Angela is countered by nimble Assassins with burst damage, such as Ling and Harley.
